H0.text: It freezes is what happens to the water vapor in an air mass as it ascends.

H1.text: It condenses as the water vapor in an air mass ascends.

H2.text: It vaporizes is what happens to the water vapor in an air mass as it ascends.

H3.text: It polarizes as the water vapor in an air mass ascends.

A4.text: As the air is cooled to its dew point and becomes saturated, water vapor normally condenses to form cloud drops.
